definitions.definition: A sudden or irregular incursion in border warfare ; hence, any irregular incursion for war or spoils; a raid .
A brief excursion or attempt, especially outside one's accustomed sphere.

main_definition: A sudden or irregular incursion in border warfare ; hence, any irregular incursion for war or spoils; a raid .
secondary_definitions: A brief excursion or attempt, especially outside one's accustomed sphere.
